channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring -- Spring Integration
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring -- Spring Integration

item.title: CVE-2019-3772|2024-08-04T19:19:18.230Z -- spring -- spring%20integration
item.description: Spring Integration (spring-integration-xml and spring-integration-ws modules), versions 4.3.18, 5.0.10, 5.1.1, and older unsupported versions, were susceptible to XML External Entity Injection (XXE) when receiving XML data from untrusted sources.
